1387850878724489219.text: Next stop, Georgia! Excited to head home to join @POTUS, @FLOTUS & @SenOssoff as we celebrate a historic 100 days in office—see y’all soon! https://t.co/yubks7f8hv

1387832300554096644.text:
Last night, @POTUS made his plan to continue moving our nation forward clear. We're not stopping at 100 days. 
 
I am laser focused on strengthening our infrastructure, creating good-paying jobs, protecting our democracy & more. Now, Congress must come together & make it happen.

1387567406306967553.text:
Heading into the U.S. Capitol to watch President Biden deliver his first joint address to Congress.

1387560967370944520.text: This evening, I am joining @POTUS during his Joint Address to Congress. I am proud of how we’ve worked for Georgia in our first 100 days & I look to moving forward, together, to brighter days ahead.

1387529723526455296.text:

1387512573126483972.text: Today on #WorkersMemorialDay, I am honoring workers who have been injured or lost their lives on the job—especially those who have been on the frontlines of our efforts to combat the pandemic. I will always stand up & fight to protect the dignity & safety of workers.

1387497367113543687.text:

1372352190292054022.text: Tonight, I’m joining @maddow a little after 9:15 PM ET to discuss the anti-democratic efforts in GA—and across the nation—to suppress the vote. I made clear on the Senate floor today Congress must take action to protect voting rights. Tune in!

1372337668617601027.text: We owe it to our civil rights heroes, like the late Congressman John Lewis, to ensure all voices can be heard at the ballot box.
